definition: to cover/to encase/cover/sheath/to overlap/to interleave/to model after/to copy/formula/harness/loop of rope/(fig.) to fish for/to obtain slyly/classifier for sets, collections/bend (of a river or mountain range, in place names)/tau (Greek letter Ττ)

sentences.english: Later, the names of her three sons became the names of the Muqam suites.
sentences.chinese: 後來，這三個兒子的名字就成了木卡姆套曲的名稱。

sentences.english: Chapter II, three groups of vocal music divertimento analysis.
sentences.chinese: 第二章，三組聲樂套曲的音樂分析。

sentences.english: The second chapter briefs the creative style and characteristics of Schumann's piano cycle.
sentences.chinese: 第二章介紹了舒曼鋼琴套曲的創作風格及特徵。

sentences.english: Chapter III, three groups divertimento vocal characteristics of the technical and creative.
sentences.chinese: 第三章，三組聲樂套曲的技術和創作特點。

definition: sonata form (one of the large-scale structures used in Western classical music)
musical ensemble of several instruments (e.g. duet 二重奏 or trio 三重奏)
